languages.text: "Дитя, ты собираешься обуздать мощь Атласа в одиночку? Забрать его силы лишь в свои руки? Нет... Нет, так не пойдет! Даже сильнейшие навигаторы Дома Орселлио не смогли бы вынести подобной ноши. Да что уж, сама Тисифона, Трон ее покарай, не смогла бы! Атлас должен быть уничтожен полностью. Окончательно. Пусть даже ценой тому послужат души предков, запертых внутри".

traits.locale_text: "Дитя, ты собираешься обуздать мощь Атласа в одиночку? Забрать его силы лишь в свои руки? Нет... Нет, так не пойдет! Даже сильнейшие Навигаторы Дома Орселлио не смогли бы вынести подобной ноши. Да что уж, сама Тисифона, Трон ее покарай, не смогла бы! Атлас должен быть уничтожен полностью. Окончательно. Пусть даже ценой тому послужат души предков, запертых внутри".

languages.text: "You think you can restrain the entire might of the Atlas on your own, Child? Hold it in your own two hands? No... No, I don't think so! Even the strongest of Orsellio Navigators could not have shouldered such a burden. Worse still, even Tisiphone herself couldn't have, Throne smite her! The Atlas must be destroyed. All of it, for good. Even if it means we have to pay with our ancestors' souls that are trapped within."
languages.original_text: "Дитя, ты собираешься обуздать мощь Атласа в одиночку? Забрать его силы лишь в свои руки? Нет... Нет, так не пойдет! Даже сильнейшие навигаторы Дома Орселлио не смогли бы вынести подобной ноши. Да что уж, сама Тисифона, Трон ее покарай, не смогла бы! Атлас должен быть уничтожен полностью. Окончательно. Пусть даже ценой тому послужат души предков, запертых внутри".

traits.locale_text: "You think you can the entire might of the Atlas on your own, Child? Hold it in your own two hands? No... No, I don't think so! Even the strongest of Orsellio Navigators could not have carried such a burden. Why, even Tisiphone herself couldn't have, Throne smite her! The Atlas must be destroyed. All of it, for good. Even if it means we have to pay with our ancestors' souls that are trapped within."

"You think you can the entire might of the Atlas on your own, Child? Hold it in your own two hands? No... No, I don't think so! Even the strongest of Orsellio Navigators could not have carried such a burden. Why, even Tisiphone herself couldn't have, Throne smite her! The Atlas must be destroyed. All of it, for good. Even if it means we have to pay with our ancestors' souls that are trapped within."

"You think you can the entire might of the Atlas on your own, Child? Hold it in your own two hands? No... No, I don't think so! Even the strongest of Orsellio Navigators could not have shouldered such a burden. Worse still, even Tisiphone herself couldn't have, Throne smite her! The Atlas must be destroyed. All of it, for good. Even if it means we have to pay with our ancestors' souls that are trapped within."

"You think you can the entire might of the Atlas on your own, Child? Hold it in your own two hands? No... No, I don't think so! Even the strongest of Orsellio Navigators could not have shouldered such a burden. Worse still, even Tisiphone herself couldn't have, Throne smite her! The Atlas must be destroyed. All of it, for good. Even if it means we have to pay with our ancestors' souls that are trapped within."

"You think you can restrain the entire might of the Atlas on your own, Child? Hold it in your own two hands? No... No, I don't think so! Even the strongest of Orsellio Navigators could not have shouldered such a burden. Worse still, even Tisiphone herself couldn't have, Throne smite her! The Atlas must be destroyed. All of it, for good. Even if it means we have to pay with our ancestors' souls that are trapped within."

"You think you can restrain the entire might of the Atlas on your own, Child? Hold it in your own two hands? No... No, I don't think so! Even the strongest of Orsellio Navigators could not have shouldered such a burden. Worse still, even Tisiphone herself couldn't have, Throne smite her! The Atlas must be destroyed. All of it, for good. Even if it means we have to pay with our ancestors' souls that are trapped within."

languages.text: 「アトラスの力すべてを抑えられるとお思いですか、御子よ？その両手に収まると？無理だ…そんなの不可能です！オーセリオ家で一番の力を持つ航宙士さえ、その負荷には耐えてこれませんでした。さらに悪い話です、ティシフォン自身さえ持て余し、玉座の罰を受けたのです！アトラスは破壊しなくてはなりません。これで終わりにするのです。その中に囚われている父祖の魂を犠牲にする必要があるとしても」
languages.original_text: "You think you can restrain the entire might of the Atlas on your own, Child? Hold it in your own two hands? No... No, I don't think so! Even the strongest of Orsellio Navigators could not have shouldered such a burden. Worse still, even Tisiphone herself couldn't have, Throne smite her! The Atlas must be destroyed. All of it, for good. Even if it means we have to pay with our ancestors' souls that are trapped within."

traits.locale_text: 「アトラスの力すべてをその身に受けられるとお思いですか、御子よ？その両手に収まると？無理だ…そんなの不可能です！オーセリオ家で一番の力を持つ航宙士さえ、その負荷には耐えてこれませんでした。さらに悪い話です、ティシフォン自身さえ持て余し、玉座の罰を受けたのです！アトラスは破壊しなくてはなりません。これで終わりにするのです。その中に囚われている父祖の魂を犠牲にする必要があるとしても」

languages.text: “你真的以为，你一个人就能控制住圣仪的力量吗，圣子？你打算靠你自己的双手控制住它吗？不……不，我看不行！哪怕是奥赛罗家族最强大的导航者，也无法承担如此可怕的重负。更糟糕的是，黄金王座在上，甚至连提西福涅本人都无法承受它的力量！圣仪必须摧毁，必须彻底摧毁。哪怕圣仪中所有祖先的灵魂就此殒灭，我们也别无选择。”
languages.original_text: "You think you can restrain the entire might of the Atlas on your own, Child? Hold it in your own two hands? No... No, I don't think so! Even the strongest of Orsellio Navigators could not have shouldered such a burden. Worse still, even Tisiphone herself couldn't have, Throne smite her! The Atlas must be destroyed. All of it, for good. Even if it means we have to pay with our ancestors' souls that are trapped within."

traits.locale_text: “你真的以为，你一个人就能控制住圣仪的力量吗，圣子？你打算靠你自己的双手控制住它吗？不……不，我看不行！哪怕是奥塞罗家族最强大的导航者，也无法承担如此可怕的重负。更糟糕的是，黄金王座在上，甚至连提西福涅本人都无法承受它的力量！圣仪必须摧毁，必须彻底摧毁。哪怕圣仪中所有祖先的灵魂就此殒灭，我们也别无选择。”

languages.text: « Vous croyez vraiment être capable de maîtriser la puissance de l'Atlas à vous seule ? De la garder sous contrôle ? Non... Non, c'est impossible ! Même les navigateurs Orsellio les plus puissants ne peuvent supporter un tel fardeau. Tisiphone elle-même n'y est pas parvenue, que le Trône l'emporte ! L'Atlas doit être détruit. Une bonne fois pour toutes. Et même si cela implique de sacrifier les âmes de nos ancêtres qui y sont enfermées. »
languages.original_text: "You think you can restrain the entire might of the Atlas on your own, Child? Hold it in your own two hands? No... No, I don't think so! Even the strongest of Orsellio Navigators could not have shouldered such a burden. Worse still, even Tisiphone herself couldn't have, Throne smite her! The Atlas must be destroyed. All of it, for good. Even if it means we have to pay with our ancestors' souls that are trapped within."

traits.locale_text: « Vous croyez vraiment être capable de maîtriser la puissance de l'Atlas seule ? De la garder sous contrôle ? Non... Non, c'est impossible ! Même les navigateurs Orsellio les plus puissants ne peuvent pas supporter un tel fardeau. Tisiphone elle-même n'y est pas parvenue, que le Trône l'emporte ! L'Atlas doit être détruit. Une bonne fois pour toutes. Et même si cela implique de sacrifier les âmes de nos ancêtres. »

languages.text: «¿Cree que puede refrenar todo el poder del Atlas en solitario, niña? ¿Sostenerlo en sus manos? No... ¡No, no lo creo! Ni siquiera los Navegantes Orsellio más poderosos podrían haber cargado con él. Es más, ¡ni la mismísima Tisiphone habría podido, que el Trono se la lleve! El Atlas debe ser destruido. Por completo, por el bien de todos. Aunque tengamos que pagarlo con el encierro de las almas de nuestros ancestros».
languages.original_text: "You think you can restrain the entire might of the Atlas on your own, Child? Hold it in your own two hands? No... No, I don't think so! Even the strongest of Orsellio Navigators could not have shouldered such a burden. Worse still, even Tisiphone herself couldn't have, Throne smite her! The Atlas must be destroyed. All of it, for good. Even if it means we have to pay with our ancestors' souls that are trapped within."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cree que puede soportar todo el poder del Atlas en solitario, niña? ¿Sostenerlo en sus manos? No... ¡No, no lo creo! Ni siquiera los Navegantes Orsellio más poderosos podrían haber cargado con él. Es más, ¡ni la mismísima Tisiphone habría podido, que el Trono se la lleve! El Atlas debe ser destruido. Por completo, por el bien de todos. Aunque tengamos que pagarlo con el encierro de las almas de nuestros ancestros».

languages.text: "Ihr glaubt, Ihr könntet allein die gesamte Macht des Atlas bändigen, Kind? Sie in Euren eigenen zwei Händen halten? Nein ... Nein, das bezweifle ich! Selbst die stärksten Orsellio-Navigatoren hätten diese Last nicht schultern können. Schlimmer noch, nicht einmal Tisiphone selbst hätte das gekonnt, möge der Thron sie niederstrecken! Der Atlas muss zerstört werden. Der ganze. Für immer. Selbst, wenn das bedeutet, dass wir mit den Seelen unserer Ahnen bezahlen müssen, die darin eingesperrt sind."
languages.original_text: "You think you can restrain the entire might of the Atlas on your own, Child? Hold it in your own two hands? No... No, I don't think so! Even the strongest of Orsellio Navigators could not have shouldered such a burden. Worse still, even Tisiphone herself couldn't have, Throne smite her! The Atlas must be destroyed. All of it, for good. Even if it means we have to pay with our ancestors' souls that are trapped within."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr glaubt, Ihr würdet allein mit der gesamten Macht des Atlas fertigwerden, Kind? Sie in Euren eigenen zwei Händen halten? Nein ... Nein, das bezweifle ich! Selbst die stärksten Orsellio-Navigatoren hätten diese Last nicht schultern können. Schlimmer noch, nicht einmal Tisiphone selbst hätte das gekonnt, möge der Thron sie niederstrecken! Der Atlas muss zerstört werden. Der ganze. Für immer. Selbst, wenn das bedeutet, dass wir mit den Seelen unserer Ahnen bezahlen müssen, die darin eingesperrt sind."

languages.text: "Atlas'ın gücünün tamamına hâkim olabileceğini mi sanıyorsun Çocuk? Kendi iki elinle tutabileceğini mi? Hayır... Hayır, hiç sanmıyorum! Orsellio Rotacılarının en güçlüleri bile böylesine ağır bir yükü sırtlayamazdı. Hatta Taht çarpsın, Tisiphone'nin ta kendisi bile! Atlas yok edilmeli. Tamamen ve kalıcı olarak. Bunun bedeli, içinde tutsak kalan atalarımızın ruhları olsa bile."
languages.original_text: "You think you can restrain the entire might of the Atlas on your own, Child? Hold it in your own two hands? No... No, I don't think so! Even the strongest of Orsellio Navigators could not have shouldered such a burden. Worse still, even Tisiphone herself couldn't have, Throne smite her! The Atlas must be destroyed. All of it, for good. Even if it means we have to pay with our ancestors' souls that are trapped within."

traits.locale_text: "Atlas'ın gücünün tamamına hâkim olabileceğini mi sanıyorsun Çocuk? Kendi iki elinle tutabileceğini mi? Hayır... Hayır, hiç sanmıyorum! Orsellio Rotacılarının en güçlüleri bile böylesine ağır bir yükü sırtlayamazdı. Hatta Taht çarpsın, Tisiphone'nin ta kendisi bile! Atlas yok edilmeli. Tamamen ve kalıcı olarak. Bunun bedeli, içinde tutsak kalan atalarımızın ruhları olsa bile."
